docs.title: Demo
docs.text:
A demo package of an application to obtain the capital of a country using a SOAP web service.

Documentación: https://antmartinez68.github.io/demo

Código fuente: https://github.com/antmartinez68/demo

Uso:

$ demo IT
The capital of Italy is <span style="color:#A6E22E">Rome</span>
Demo with love 💜💜

docs.title: demo
docs.text:
Find the capital of a country

Usage:

$ demo [OPTIONS] COUNTRY_ISO_CODE

Arguments:

  • COUNTRY_ISO_CODE: ISO code for country to find [required]

Options:

  • --install-completion: Install completion for the current shell.
  • --show-completion: Show completion for the current shell, to copy it or customize the installation.
  • --help: Show this message and exit.
